Name: Discreet
About the game: Disclaimer: Discreet can only be played by 3 players. Are you a thief? Then your mission will be to steal the most object with your accomplice without the owner seeing you. You have the possibility of crouching and being able to hide in the cupboards. You will then have to steal the objects and then bring them back to your truck. You are the owner ? You will do everything to protect your house, go for a stop, steal thieves by setting traps, and more! You have the possibility of being able to put down a thief so that the latter is 'Game Over'. You can also look in the closet to see if a thief is inside.
